text:
Keypr - http://keypr.com - Los Angeles, CA

We are an early-stage startup that is redefining the guest experience at hotels worldwide. We're looking for a few talented front-end and iOS developers to join our small, but growing team.

Front-end engineers should have expert knowledge in HTML/CSS/JavaScript as well as JavaScript frameworks (Backbone, AngularJS, Marionette). We also need iOS developers.

If this sounds interesting, send a short note to jobs@keypr.com. Please include links to any code or relevant work samples, and be sure to mention you're from HN.

Cheers!
